attributes.action: Make the New Deal for the unemployed more relevant
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The New Deal initiative is aimed at giving umemployed people the best chance of getting back into work, through training courses & mandatory 'options'. These currently are failing in almost every respect of what they were designed to do, as people simply go around the ever-repeating cycle.

rejection.details:
This petition overlaps with several already in existence –
http://petitions.pm.gov.uk/NewDeal/
reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
